description: Elm wood log with radial ring pattern on top/bottom faces and bark texture on side faces

patterns.note: Radial pattern approximation for universal generator

dark_spots.description: Deep ring lines and bark texture

elm_log_top.step1: Calculate distance from center: distFromCenter = sqrt((x-8)² + (y-8)²)
elm_log_top.step2: Generate radial ring pattern: ringPattern = sin(distFromCenter * 1.4) * 0.4 + 0.6
elm_log_top.step3: Generate zig-zag grain: zigzagPattern = sin(x*0.9 + y*0.7) * cos(x*1.2 - y*0.8) * 0.3
elm_log_top.step4: Apply base colors with ring and zigzag adjustments

elm_log_sides.step1: Generate vertical wood grain: woodGrain = sin(y * 1.5) * 0.5 + 0.5
elm_log_sides.step2: Generate horizontal bark texture: barkTexture = sin(x * 0.7) * 0.4 + 0.6
elm_log_sides.step3: Generate interlocked grain: grainNoise = sin(x*0.8 + y*0.6)*0.3 + cos(x*0.5 - y*0.9)*0.2
elm_log_sides.step4: Combine all patterns with base bark colors
elm_log_sides.step5: Clamp to darker reddish-brown bark range

unique_features: Multi-face log texture with different algorithms for top/sides
Radial ring pattern from center point for authentic log cross-section
Vertical wood grain on sides for realistic log appearance
Horizontal bark texture overlay on sides
Interlocked grain pattern simulating elm's complex wood structure
Reddish-brown color palette distinctive to elm wood
Different color ranges for heartwood (top) vs bark (sides)
universal_generator_adaptation: Radial patterns approximated using light_specks with center-focused modulo
Zig-zag and interlocked grain simplified to supported noise types
Multi-component patterns combined through feature overlays
Color clamping handled through base color variance ranges
conversion_notes.validation_required: Generated texture must show radial rings on top faces and vertical bark grain on side faces
